<lj-template name="qotd" id="483" />

It would be a mix between Big Brother and the film "Cube". I liked the first time I saw those whistar specie of humans on tv -Skinner should've been proud- but something was missing there beyond the sentimental pornography, a real meaning for the group... 

I really don't like the reality shows or TV, I really can live without it :), but everytime someone mentions the subject i like to tell them my idea... :)

does your family love you, does the White Clown love you??


Manzana Oscura.

July 20, 2008.
Today is the saddest day of my life, I have lost a very good friend. A kindred spirit has gone... a part of my heart is gone too. hope to find soon -in this grief- the heal for my pain and sorrow. It is a mourning day and time for me.

Save The World - One Click At A Time!

On each of these websites, you can click a button to support the cause -- each click creates funding, and costs you nothing! Bookmark these sites, and click once a day!



Code:

Chantal Sebire (1956-2008)


Please forgive us for being so blind in spirit and understanding, for letting you suffer the fear and pain that none of us could ever imagine.

Life's but a walking shadow, a poor player That struts and frets his hour upon the stage And then is heard no more: it is a tale Told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, Signifying nothing. (Shakespeare, Macbeth, Act V, Scene 5)

I went to the city where I belong... 

My heart changed there. 

I cried for the past and the future... nothing was there except my memories.
Something is broken, Loneliness and sorrow. Hands were able to speak and they were hurt by each other. Heart was there, crying. I have no time today. Not for tears. Colors in red and white... Banshee
Sadness won't last forever, it's just a moment... I said that once, long time ago... I am very sad since then...

...the world seems too strange to be real.
...The time is passing too slow.
...I want to visit your website, but I don't remember the address... Do I know it?
...I do try to sleep, but I can't! Too much coffee!!
...I wonder about many things I care... and they are really not important.
...The moon is a face and the sun is a nightmare!
...My cat is looking for an imaginary cat...
I do write things like this...

My mind is not so well,

...Sometimes...

I found this image on deviantart,
An Apple by *Fishdot on deviantART I wish for you the best, dear reader!

A life.. or a journey? who knows...

Please remember that english is not my first language. So, please be patient and send me or write the corrections.

I wonder if you, my dear reader are there...

I wonder if one of my angels is waiting outside...

Is there any lost soul?

These are some thoughts I had in today.


Banshee

Some words are just so hurting, wondering for a sign or a seed to be forgotten... 

I wonder if the meaning is the same for everyone.

Is that so simple or is just my fear?

Who knows...

Let see what happens.
